title: Evaporative Canister (if fitted) - Removal

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Remove the Rear Wheel DB4; DBB; DT4; DTB; DTC; DU4; DUB; DUC

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DBB; DUC; DTB; DUB; DTC; DB4; DU4; DT4

body.body: Remove left and right hand side panels D34; D54; D64; D72; D92; DA2; DB; DB2; DB4; DBB; DBX; DC; DC3; DC4; DCZ; DD2; DD4; DE; DE2; DEX; DF; DF2; DF4; DG4; DP; DP2; DP3; DP4; DPA; DPZ; DT3; DT4; DTB; DTC; DU; DU3; DU4; DUB; DUC; DUY; DZ

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DCB; DBB; DUC; DTB; DUB; DA2; DTC; DCZ; DPZ; D34; DU4; DT4; DD4; DB4; D64; D54; DC3; DC; DC4; DP4; D72; D92; DG4; DF4; DB2; DU3; DT3; DEX; DD2; DP3; DF2; DF; DP2; DZ; DBX; DB; DE2; DE; DUY; DU; DPA; DP

body.body: EVAP Canister Removal - DTC; D54; D64; D72; D92; DB; DB2; DB4; DBX; DC; DC3; DC4; DCZ; DP; DP2; DP3; DP4; DPA; DPZ; DT3; DT4; DU; DU3; DU4; DUY; DZ; DZA; DTB; DUB; DUC
Detach the two hoses on the left hand side of the evaporative canister.
Note the position of the two hoses attached to the left hand side of the evaporative canister for installation.
Remove the fixings and washers securing the evaporative canister to the right hand side of the airbox.
Slide the evaporative canister to the right hand side to release its locating lug from the airbox grommet and remove.

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DCB; DBB; DUC; DUB; DTB; DA2; DTC; DPZ; DCZ; DU4; DT4; DB4; D54; D64; DP4; DC4; D72; D92; DB2; DU3; DT3; DUY; DU; DC3; DC; DZA; DZ; DP3; DBX; DB; DP2; DPA; DP
